sentences.sContent: Unless you intend the list to be all-inclusive, you had better clarify your intent that it is merely an example.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unless you intend the list to be all-inclusive, you had better clarify your intent that it is merely an example.
sentences.sCn: 除非你能够列出所有被包括的项，否则最好用"但不限于...." 的分句，来说明你只是想举个例子。

sentences.sContent: As a convenience, I use the term "mechanism," as in the phrase "governance mechanism" to be all-inclusive of the components identified above.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a convenience, I use the term "mechanism," as in the phrase "governance mechanism" to be all-inclusive of the components identified above.
sentences.sCn: 为了方便起见，如在短语“治理机制”中一样，我使用术语“机制”来包括上面所识别的所有组成部分。

synos.tran: 包括一切的；广泛的；详尽的

trans.tranOther: including the cost of everything in the price charged
